newsitem.title: USA: Inso says sees Q2 eps less than $0.10/shr.
newsitem.headline: Inso says sees Q2 eps less than $0.10/shr.

text.p: Inso Corp on Wednesday predicted second quarter earnings of less than $0.10 per share before a restructuring charge of roughly $5 million to $6 million.
As part of its restructuring plan, also announced Wednesday, Inso said it would reduce 40 positions.
In addition, the company said it expects revenues for the quarter ending June 30, 1997, of about $19.5 million to $20.5 million.
Inso posted 1996 second quarter earnings of $0.29 per share on revenues of $15.1 million.
Inso attributed lower-than-planned revenues in part to the deterioration of the original equipment manufacturer (OEM) markets served by IP and certain IMT products.
